00031 using namespace Hypertable;
00032 using namespace std;

00035 BlockCompressionCodec::Type
00036 CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(const string &spec,
00037                                           BlockCompressionCodec::Args &args) {
00038   string name;
00039 
00040   split(args, spec, is_any_of(" \t"), token_compress_on);
00041 
00042   if (!args.empty()) {
00043     name = args.front();
00044     args.erase(args.begin());
00045   }
00046 
00047   if (name == "none" || name.empty())
00048     return BlockCompressionCodec::NONE;
00049 
00050   if (name == "bmz")
00051     return BlockCompressionCodec::BMZ;
00052 
00053   if (name == "zlib")
00054     return BlockCompressionCodec::ZLIB;
00055 
00056   if (name == "lzo")
00057     return BlockCompressionCodec::LZO;
00058 
00059   if (name == "quicklz")
00060     return BlockCompressionCodec::QUICKLZ;
00061 
00062   HT_ERRORF("unknown codec type: %s", name.c_str());
00063   return BlockCompressionCodec::UNKNOWN;
00064 }
00065 
00066 BlockCompressionCodec *
00067 CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(BlockCompressionCodec::Type type,
00068                                       const BlockCompressionCodec::Args &args) {
00069   switch (type) {
00070   case BlockCompressionCodec::BMZ:
00071     return new BlockCompressionCodecBmz(args);
00072   case BlockCompressionCodec::NONE:
00073     return new BlockCompressionCodecNone(args);
00074   case BlockCompressionCodec::ZLIB:
00075     return new BlockCompressionCodecZlib(args);
00076   case BlockCompressionCodec::LZO:
00077     return new BlockCompressionCodecLzo(args);
00078   case BlockCompressionCodec::QUICKLZ:
00079     return new BlockCompressionCodecQuicklz(args);
00080   default:
00081     return NULL;
00082   }
00083 }
